attributes.action: Sack all remain MPS as they go against the will of the People
attributes.additional_details: We are the people. They serve us. NOT the other way around!
attributes.background: We the 17.4 million people who voted to leave, demand that every remain mp in the United Kingdom are held to account for their actions. They claim they have our best interests at heart BUT they have their own agenda! We demand instant dismissals of these MPs

rejection.details: The Government or Parliament are not responsible for removing MP's from office due to their views or opinions.
